snippet: The struggling Caterham and Marussia Formula One teams will both miss next week's U.S. Grand Prix in Austin, Texas, the sport's commercial supremo Bernie Ecclestone told Reuters on Saturday....

headline.print_headline: Motor Racing-Caterham and Marussia to Miss Next Races; Ecclestone
headline.main: Motor Racing-Caterham and Marussia to Miss Next Races; Ecclestone

lead_paragraph: The struggling Caterham and Marussia Formula One teams will both miss next week's U.S. Grand Prix in Austin, Texas, the sport's commercial supremo Bernie Ecclestone told Reuters on Saturday.
